create.title: New Run
create.description: Choose a store to start a new group purchase
create.commentPlaceholder: Optional: Add a comment about this run...

actions.forceConfirmTooltip: Force confirm and move to shopping

labels.commentPlaceholder: Add a comment about this run...
labels.readyHint: Check this when you're ready for the leader to start shopping
labels.startShoppingHint: Once shopping starts, you can track what's been purchased
labels.trackPricesHint: Use the shopping list to track prices and purchases
labels.adjustingBidsDescription: Adjust quantities based on what was purchased
labels.finishAdjustingHint: All participants must adjust their bids before moving to distribution

validation.quantityGreaterThanZero: Quantity must be greater than zero

messages.leadershipRequestDeclined: Your leadership transfer request was declined
messages.leadershipTransferRequest: {{userName}} wants to transfer leadership to you

prompts.forceFinishAdjusting: Are you sure you want to force finish adjusting? This will move to distribution even if some participants haven't adjusted their bids.
prompts.cancelRun: Are you sure you want to cancel this run? This cannot be undone.

bid.title: Place Your Bid
bid.adjustingModeDescription: You can only reduce your quantity.
bid.adjustingModeDescriptionIncrease: You can only increase your quantity.
bid.commentPlaceholder: Optional: Add a note about your bid...

reassign.title: Reassign Leadership
reassign.description: Transfer run leadership to another participant
reassign.noParticipantsAvailable: No participants available to take over leadership

helpers.title: Manage Helpers
helpers.description: Helpers can shop and distribute items alongside the leader

forceConfirm.title: Force Confirm Run
forceConfirm.warningDescription: This will skip waiting for all participants to be ready and immediately move to the shopping phase.
forceConfirm.reason2: You need to start shopping urgently
forceConfirm.reason3: You've coordinated with the group outside the app
forceConfirm.consequence: Participants who haven't marked themselves as ready will still be included in the run.

empty.noProducts: No products added yet. Click 'Add Product' to start!

states.planningDescription: Add products and place your bids
states.activeDescription: Waiting for all participants to mark themselves as ready
states.shoppingDescription: Leader is shopping and tracking prices
states.adjustingDescription: Participants can adjust their bids based on what was purchased
states.distributingDescription: Items are being distributed to participants
